data.route: T1 North Shore and Western Line and T9 Northern Line
data.alert: Get tested immediately. Self-isolate until you get a negative result.
data.health_advice: Anyone who travelled on this service is a casual contact and must get tested and self-isolate until they receive a negative result. If you were on this service less than 4 days from the date of exposure you must get another test 5 days after you were there. Wear a mask around others and limit your movements until you get another negative result. You should continue to monitor for symptoms and if any symptoms occur, get tested again.
